item.title: “A Hitchhiker’s Guide to R for Data Science (2e)”; RPIrates Monthly Meeting (Weds, 15 Oct, 6p, AE217)
item.description: RPI R users are invited to the October 2025 meeting of RPIrates: The RPI R Users Group! Our topic for Weds, 15 Sep (6p, AE217) will be “A Hitchhiker’s Guide to ‘R for Data Science (2e)’”. Whether you are new to R or consider yourself a veteran, you’ll gain a new appreciation of the R language and platform through the lens of R4DS! RPIrates is led by Dr. John S. Erickson, Director of Research Operations of the Rensselaer IDEA and Chief Instigator of RPIrates. Pizza and salad starts at 5:30p.

item.title: DotCIO announces Retirement of EZ-Snapshot Service
item.description: This notice is to announce the retirement of the EZ-Snapshot service effective Monday, November 3rd, 2025. Sometimes referred to as EZ-Backup, the service was created in 2006 using enterprise-class tape backup technology and was used to backup departmental, research and individual servers and workstations. It has fallen out of use in the past several years, having been replaced by a modern disk-based backup solution.

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Seminar: “Supervisory Essentials”
item.description: In this seminar, Managers and Supervisors will learn from each other and our Facilitators about important topics such as the Employee Value Proposition and Employee Experience, the six fundamental Leadership competencies at Rensselaer, and experience a “day in the life” of a Supervisor. In addition, the importance of managing employee performance, providing both rewards and recognition, employment law fundamentals and tools for building team capacity will be explored.
